mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tender ( id, name, description, active, investor_id,user_id) VALUES (#{tender.id}, #{tender.name},#{tender.description},#{tender.active},#{tender.investor.id},#{tender.user.id})
mapper.select: SELECT t.id,t.name,t.description,t.active,u.id as user_id,username, i.id as investor_id, i.name AS investor_name FROM tender t LEFT JOIN user u ON (t.user_id = u.id) LEFT JOIN investor i ON (t.investor_id = i.id) WHERE t.id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE tender SET active = TRUE WHERE id = #{id}
